title: Ticket #5388: HTCondor View: URL history for internal changes
description:
When using the tabbed/radio-button interface (htcondorview-linked.js), changing the options does not change the URL. As a result, you can't easily go backward and forward.

Similarly, when you click on a row in a table, modifying the linked graph, no URL change.

Both should update the URL in a way that allows bookmarking and going back and forward.

This could be through manipulating the history directly, probably by manipulating the search arguments. There is some old commented out code in htcondorview.js for doing this. (index.html?foo=bar)

The other option is manipulating document.location directly with anchors (index.html#foo=bar); that should allow the history to just work.
